meanings.definition: Someone who does too much or goes to extremes in their actions or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The overdoer in our group always takes on more tasks than they can handle.
meanings.sent2: The overdoer at work stayed late every day to finish all the projects.
meanings.sent3: The overdoer decided to clean the entire house top to bottom in just one day!
meanings.sent4: She was known as the overdoer of kindness, always going above and beyond to help others.
meanings.sent5: The overdoer's dedication to perfection often led to burnout and exhaustion.
